title: mm血量问题
author: XL铭梦、
txt_content:
召唤出来的怪只有20HP，求怎么解决

恶魔之主:
  Type: ZOMBIE
  Display: '&c恶魔之主'
  Health: 3000000
  Damage: 0
  BossBar:
    Enabled: true
    Range: 12
    Color: RED
    Style: SEGMENTED_1
    Title: '&l<mob.name> &7 [&a&l血量：&d&l<mob.hp> /&b&l<mob.mhp> &7]&b&l目标：&f[&c&l<mob.tt.top>&f]'
  DamageModifiers:
  - FIRE_TICK 0
  - FIRE 0
  Modules:
    ThreatTable: true
  Equipment:
  - 金帽:4
  - 金甲:3
  - 金裤:2
  - 金靴:1
  - 恐惧惊骸金剑:0
  KillMessages:
  - '&7[&b<target.name>&7]&6被&c<mob.name>&6砍死了'
  Skills:
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    KnockbackResistance: 1
    MovementSpeed: 0.0001
    FollowRange: 12
    MaxCombatDistance: 50
    PreventOtherDrops: true
  Drops:

replies.author: Charlotte-Arthu
replies.txt_content:
服务端spigot里面attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 999999.0
    movementSpeed:
      max: 999999.0
    attackDamage:
      max: 999999.0

replies.author: 蟹蒙老鸽
replies.txt_content: 你把血量改为30看看，会不会是设置太大的效果。还有就是spiog.yml里面的血量上限改了没有M，默认是2048

replies.author: FairyCanyue
replies.txt_content: 服务端根目录的spiog.yml的血量上限限制的
